sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase between 2010 and 2018; while China and America keep stable between 2010 and 2018.
There is an unusual drop in 2017 of Japan.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan increase between 2010 and 2018; while China and America keep stable between 2010 and 2018.
There is an unusual drop in 2017 of Japan.
